/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastList */ select a.*, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from ( SELECT a.room_no AS roomNo ,a.title AS title ,a.msg_welcom AS msgWelcom ,a.subject_type,(select code from rd_data.tbl_code_define aa where aa.value = a.subject_type and aa.type ='subject_type') type ,(CASE a.type_entry WHEN 0 THEN '제한없음' WHEN 1 THEN '펜만' WHEN 2 THEN '20세이상' end) AS typeEntry ,a.notice AS notice ,(SELECT code FROM rd_data.tbl_code_define aa WHERE aa.value = a.state and aa.type = 'broadcast_state') state ,CONCAT(a.count_entry,'건') AS entryCnt ,CONCAT(a.count_good,'건') AS goodCnt ,DATE_FORMAT(a.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startDate ,a.mem_no AS memNo ,b.mem_nick AS memNick ,b.mem_sex AS memSex ,b.mem_id AS memId ,a.badge_recomm as badgeRecomm ,a.badge_popular as badgePopular ,a.badge_newdj as badgeNewdj ,a.expected_end_date as expectedEndDate ,a.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate ,c.image_profile as imageProfile ,(CASE WHEN a.badge_recomm = 1 and a.badge_popular = 1 and a.badge_newdj = 1 THEN 'ALL' WHEN a.badge_recomm = 1 and a.badge_popular = 1 THEN 'repo' WHEN a.badge_recomm = 1 and a.badge_newdj = 1 THEN 'rene' WHEN a.badge_popular = 1 and a.badge_newdj = 1 THEN 'pone' WHEN a.badge_recomm = 1 THEN 're' WHEN a.badge_popular = 1 THEN 'po' WHEN a.badge_newdj = 1 THEN 'ne' end) AS tag ,concat((SELECT count(*) cnt from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_story where room_no = a.room_no),'건') as storyCnt ,concat((select sum(gift_cnt) from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member where room_no=a.room_no),'건') as giftCnt FROM rd_data.tb_broadcast_room a, tb_member_basic b, tb_member_profile c WHERE a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.mem_no = c.mem_no -- AND state != 4
AND (b.mem_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR b.mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR b.mem_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR c.mem_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
AND b.mem_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND b.mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND b.mem_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND c.mem_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND (a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%') OR a.msg_welcom LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%') OR a.notice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%'))
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')
AND a.msg_welcom LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')
AND a.notice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')
ORDER BY ${orderColumnName} ${orderDir} limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt} ) a, (SELECT @RNUM := #{pageStart}) r

/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastList_cnt */ SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM rd_data.tb_broadcast_room a, rd_data.tb_member_basic b, rd_data.tb_member_profile c WHERE a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.mem_no = c.mem_no -- AND state != 4
AND (b.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR b.mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
AND b.mem_nick LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND b.mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND (a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%') OR a.msg_welcom LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%') OR a.notice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%'))
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')
AND a.msg_welcom LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')
AND a.notice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBroad},'%')

/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastInfo */ SELECT a.room_no as roomNo ,a.subject_type as type ,a.title as title ,a.image_background as backgroundImage ,a.msg_welcom as msgWelcom ,a.type_entry as typeEntry ,(select code FROM rd_data.tbl_code_define aa WHERE value = a.state and type = 'broadcast_state') as state ,DATE_FORMAT(a.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as liveSt ,DATE_FORMAT(a.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as liveEd ,DATE_FORMAT(a.last_upd_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as infoEditDate ,b.mem_no as memNo ,b.mem_id as memId ,b.mem_nick as memNick ,b.mem_sex as memSex ,(SELECT count(*) cnt from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_story where room_no = a.room_no) as contentsCnt ,(select count(*) cnt from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_listening aa, rd_data.tb_member_basic bb where aa.mem_no = bb.mem_no and aa.room_no=a.room_no) as listenCnt ,(select count(*) cnt from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_block where mem_no = a.mem_no) as forceKickCnt ,(select count(*) cnt From rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member where auth = 1 and room_no = a.room_no) as manegerCnt /*방에 해당하는 매니저CNT 이력 X*/ ,(select aa.mem_no From rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member aa left join (select mem_no, mem_id, mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_basic) bb on aa.mem_no = bb.mem_no where auth = 2 and aa.room_no = a.room_no) as guestNo /*게스트번호*/ ,(select bb.mem_id From rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member aa left join (select mem_no, mem_id, mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_basic) bb on aa.mem_no = bb.mem_no where auth = 2 and aa.room_no = a.room_no) as guestId /*게스트ID*/ ,(select bb.mem_nick From rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member aa left join (select mem_no, mem_id, mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_basic) bb on aa.mem_no = bb.mem_no where auth = 2 and aa.room_no = a.room_no) as guestNick /*게스트닉네임*/ ,(select if(count(*),'on','off') From rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member aa left join (select mem_no, mem_id, mem_nick From rd_data.tb_member_basic) bb on aa.mem_no = bb.mem_no where auth = 2 and aa.room_no = a.room_no) as guestOn /*게스트여부*/ from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room a, rd_data.tb_member_basic b, rd_data.tb_member_basic c, rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_member d where a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.mem_no = c.mem_no and a.room_no = d.room_no and a.mem_no = d.mem_no and a.room_no =#{roomNo}
